column4: oh my gosh, How do I stop Shift-backspace from taking me back to the login screen
yeah its a bug in compiz
what howto are you referring to? Thanks for the lead though
try this ' xmodmap /usr/share/xmodmap/xmodmap.us' if your country code is us of course
should I get any feed back? Should I be looking @ this via NANO or gedit?
it worked! no more restarting. May I ask what that command did?
that should fix the problem, you should also add that command to the command tha initializes compiz
I think it reset X's key bindings
this may not be a viable solution, it seems I can't use any keyboard shortcuts @ all
thats the solution for that bug, I don't use xgl so ask for more help in #ubuntu-xgl
I thought I'd send you this link, http://www.compiz.net/viewtopic.php?id=1199
